name: Moodle Gemini Search Extension
description: Chrome extension for instant AI assistance using Ctrl+G with Google Gemini API
description_long: A dedicated Chrome extension that provides instant AI assistance using Google's Gemini API. Press Ctrl+G anywhere to get intelligent responses about the current page content. Features include page content analysis, image processing, text selection, and smart responses using Gemini 1.5 Flash and Pro models.
changelog: Embedded API key for immediate use
Support for page content and image analysis
Automatic model selection and usage tracking

files.content.js: Main content script with Ctrl+G functionality
files.background.js: Background service worker with API integration

features: Press Ctrl+G anywhere for instant AI assistance
Analyzes page content and images automatically
Supports text selection for targeted analysis
Uses Gemini 1.5 Flash and Pro models
Embedded API key for immediate use
Automatic usage tracking and model selection

steps: Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions/
Click 'Load unpacked' and select the folder
Test by pressing Ctrl+G on any webpage
